channel.title: fresh takes on
channel.description: Recent content in fresh takes on

item.title: AI and the heirarchy of intelligence
item.description: These were back to back in my feed: Mandy Brown on the smokescreen of AI and our narratives (it’s masking the real story; we need to re-think our hierarchy of intelligence), then Austin Kleon on AI as intern (appeasing our need to be the superior intelligence?

item.title: Science fiction futures
item.description: Visionary science fiction and fantasy is a way to practice the future. I would call our work to change the world “science fictional behavior”—being concerned with the way our actions and beliefs now, today, will shape the future, tomorrow, the next generations.
